Meta.title: Equip Modify
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
此mod提供了一个物品[祛魔粉]用其可在[枪身加工机]与任何装备合成, 清除其附魔 且获得[附魔石], 使用[附魔石]则可像改造枪械一样对任何装备或武器添加附魔 奇迹装备附魔上限默认为6 神器及以上附魔上限默认为8 默认无法为远程武器投掷武器及固定装备附魔 清除已安装改造的装备的附魔需先将其改造卸下 物品样式或是材质的天然固定附魔无法被清除 [祛魔粉]配方在[诺拉]处出售
在BepInEx配置内 (如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.equipmodify.cfg") 允许你调整: 附魔槽位上限 是否允许为远程武器附魔 是否允许为投掷武器附魔 是否允许为固定装备附魔
This mod provides an item called [dispel powder], which can be combined with any equipment in the [barrel processing machine] to remove its enchantments. Upon using the [dispel powder], you will receive an [enchant gem]. [enchant gem] can be used to add enchantments to any equipment or weapon, just like modifying firearms. The enchantment slot limit for Superior equipment is 6 by default. The enchantment slot limit for Legendary and above is 8 by default. By default, ranged weapons, throwable weapons, and fixed equipment cannot be enchanted. To remove enchantments from equipment that has been modified, you need to first disassemble the modifications. Natural fixed enchantments of an item's style or material cannot be removed. The recipe for [dispel powder] is sold by [Nola].
In the BepInEx configuration file (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.equipmodify.cfg") you can adjust: The maximum number of enchantment slots Whether to allow enchanting ranged weapons Whether to allow enchanting throwable weapons Whether to allow enchanting fixed equipment
